trans-unit.source: Represents an object that is used to interact with an operation that has been posted to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> queue.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> 큐로 게시된 작업과 상호 작용하는 데 사용되는 개체를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> returns a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> object when it is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher.BeginInvoke%2A> 반환 된 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> 호출 될 때 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> object can be used to interact with the delegate on the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> queue, such as changing the priority of the operation or aborting the operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> 에서 대리자와 상호 작용 하는 개체를 사용할 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> 큐 작업의 우선 순위를 변경 하거나 작업을 중단 합니다.

trans-unit.source: To obtain the return value of the invoked delegate, use the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation.Result%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 호출된 된 대리자의 반환 값을 가져오려면는 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation.Result%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> is not an exception handling boundary.
This means that exceptions are handled by the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> and are not preserved by the operation.
trans-unit.target: 즉,에서 예외를 처리는 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher> 및 작업에 의해 보존 되지 않습니다.

trans-unit.source: Aborts the operation.
<see langword="true" /> if the operation was aborted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 작업이 취소되었으면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: If an operation is already in progress, this method will return `false`.
trans-unit.target: 작업이 이미 진행 중인지,이 메서드는 반환 `false`합니다.

trans-unit.source: When an operation is aborted, the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation.Status%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> is set to <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus.Aborted> and the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation.Aborted> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 작업이 중단 되는 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation.Status%2A> 의 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> 로 설정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus.Aborted> 및 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation.Aborted> 이벤트가 발생 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the operation is aborted.
Occurs when the operation has completed.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> that the operation was posted to.
The dispatcher.
Returns an object that is notified when the asynchronous operation is finished.
trans-unit.target: 비동기 작업이 완료될 때 알림을 받는 개체를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: An object that is notified when the asynchronous operation is finished.
trans-unit.target: 비동기 작업이 완료될 때 알림을 받는 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Begins the operation that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation" />.
<see langword="null" /> in all cases.
Gets or sets the priority of the operation in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> queue.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Threading.Dispatcher" /> 큐에 있는 작업의 우선 순위를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: The priority of the delegate on the queue.
Gets the result of the operation after it has completed.
trans-unit.target: 작업이 완료된 후 작업 결과를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The result of the operation -or- <see langword="null" /> if the operation has not completed.
trans-unit.target: 작업이 완료되었으면 작업 결과이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="null" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the current status of the operation..
The status of the operation.

The stages of a <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation> are <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus.Pending>, <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus.Executing>, and <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus.Completed>.
At any point before the operation has completed, the status can be set to <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus.Aborted>.
trans-unit.target: 언제 든 지 작업을 완료 하기 전에 상태로 설정할 수 있습니다 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus.Aborted>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Threading.Tasks.Task`1" /> that represents the current operation.
An object that represents the current operation.
Waits for the operation to finish.
Waits for the operation to complete
The status of the operation.
To obtain the return value of the invoked delegate, use the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation.Result%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 호출된 된 대리자의 반환 값을 가져오려면는 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation.Result%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation.Status" /> is equal to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus.Executing" />.
This can occur when waiting for an operation that is already executing on the same thread.
trans-unit.target: 동일 스레드에서 이미 실행 중인 작업을 기다릴 때 이 예외가 발생할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The maximum period of time to wait.
Waits for the operation to complete in the specified period of time.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 시간 동안 작업이 완료되기를 기다립니다.

trans-unit.source: The status of the operation.
To obtain the return value of the invoked delegate, use the <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation.Result%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 호출된 된 대리자의 반환 값을 가져오려면는 <xref:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation.Result%2A> 속성입니다.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperation.Status" /> is equal to <see cref="F:System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherOperationStatus.Executing" />.
This can occur when waiting for an operation that is already executing on the same thread.
trans-unit.target: 동일 스레드에서 이미 실행 중인 작업을 기다릴 때 이 예외가 발생할 수 있습니다.
